p: The astrovirus is a significant cause of gastroenteritis in young children ( Dennehy et al., 2001, Herrmann et al., 1991). In 1978 Kurtz and Lee have conducted a study for anti-astrovirus antibodies in an English hospital; they have found that 75% of children 5â€“10 years had antibodies against this virus. The astrovirus is also an important cause of gastroenteritis in the elderly in association with other viruses, such as rotavirus or calicivirus ( Lewis et al., 1989, Gray et al., 1987).
